body.name: 4-Tier Stackable Shoe Rack Plus Storage Bag, sturdy Shoe Shelf, Non-woven Fabric Shoe Shelf with Storage Organizer, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Two-in-One Shoe and Storage Solution】This innovative shoe rack not only keeps your footwear organized but also provides a convenient storage solution for your daily essentials. The integrated storage bag allows you to quickly grab your keys, phone, or other items as you leave the house.

【Durable and Stable Construction】The shoe rack is made with high-quality materials to ensure its durability and stability. The metal tubes, non-woven fabric, and plastic connectors work together to create a solid structure that can withstand daily use.

【Space-Saving Design】With a compact width of 11.8 inches, this shoe rack is the perfect solution for narrow spaces like hallways, entryways, and garages. Despite its small footprint, it has a spacious 23.6-inch length, allowing you to store 2-3 pairs of adult shoes in a single layer and up to 6-9 pairs of shoes in total.

【Easy Assembly】Setting up this shoe and storage rack is a breeze thanks to the included clear and comprehensive instructions. No additional tools are required, making it easy for you to get your shoes and essentials organized in no time.

【Stylish and Versatile】This shoe rack can complement any decor style, from modern and minimal to traditional and cozy. Whether you're looking to organize your shoes in the entryway or create additional storage in the garage, this two-in-one solution is a convenient and stylish choice.
【After-sales service】If you encounter any problems related to the product, please contact us in time, we will be happy to serve you and will definitely give you a satisfactory solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: It's a little work to put together, took me a little over an hour (mostly due to mistakes and trying to understand the instructions), and it's not too sturdy. However, it gets the job done, and for the price, it is definitely worth it. It looks pretty nice once you've put it together and put shoes and other things on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of trash, do not buy. Cheaply made, takes hours to put together, broke while assembling.
reviews.reviewText: This product is trash. The materials are so cheap that it broke while putting it together and its HOURS of assembly work. This thing comes in 75+ pieces. Not 10 or 20, but it's an entire cheap project. 1hr in, and I broke one of the tubes. Waste of time. I blame amazon for hiding the fact that it only had 28 reviews from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple design, great for storage
reviews.reviewText: This was a little challenging to assemble because several of the pieces are very similar in size. What helped me was to lay out all the tube pieces and sort them by length so I knew which piece was which. The shelves are made from a canvas like material and are not solid, but they will still hold your shoes well. There is a protect coating on the shelves so muddy or dirty areas can easily be wiped clean. This fit great in my coat closet to store my shoes on to keep the entryway uncluttered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small space
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, sturdy and love the top compartment to hold purse keys etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but good idea
reviews.reviewText: The “instructions” that came with it are more of this is how many parts you should have (no labels on the parts- I measured the rods so I knew which where which) and vague instructions. The connectors for the rods (both) are very cheaply made, the rods seem pretty sturdy and aren’t plastic. I like the design of it, having three regular shelves and a (what looked to be deeper) basket shelf. Will see how long this lasts as one of each connector broke during assembly but I did get at least one extra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: None of the parts were labeled to match with the instructions and they didn’t work as intended either. It’s cheap for a reason, so pay a bit more to get something with better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not waste your money
reviews.reviewText: This product is very cheap. You literally get what you pay for it broke immediately. I tried to use glue to well the pieces back together. And in looks cheap*, it looks like if you touch it, it will fall apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars well made and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: i waited a little while to review this (about a month) to see how it would hold up. one of the most important parts to a shoe rack like this are the connectors that hold it together and they are excellent as pics show. thick, not flimsy squishy plastic. and the rods are thin but not that cheap soft aluminum stuff that bends really easily. they're solid. ordered gray but it's black which i'm fine with. (lighting in 1 pic makes it look kinda blue-ish but its black - frame and shelf material) have way more shoes on it than 5 or 6 per shelf and it's holding up just beautifully! little basket shelf's a useful thing too. ordered 2 of these and had an issue w missing pieces, contacted seller who immediately helped resolve the problem so 5 stars for customer service!! no issues whatsoever w parts or anything else w 2nd order so i think the 1st time i might've gotten someone's return by amazon accident or something.
Il est solide, pratique mais juste pas très grand.
